Description:
Detects suspicious access to LSASS handle via a call trace to "seclogon.dll" with a suspicious access right.

Author: Samir Bousseaden (original elastic rule), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious LSASS Access Via MalSecLogon
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where dst_process_path like '%\lsass.exe' and process_path like '%\svchost.exe' and granted_access = '0x14c0' and call_trace like '%seclogon.dll%'
